metadata.title: CVE-2022-45939 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: GNU Emacs through 28.2 allows attackers to execute commands via shell metacharacters in the name of a source-code file, because lib-src/etags.c uses the system C library function in its implementation of the ctags program. For example, a victim may use the "ctags *" command (suggested in the ctags documentation) in a situation where the current working directory has contents that depend on untrusted input.

criterions.comment: emacs package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
xemacs21 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
